title: Number of knife crimes in London 2010 to 2019
summary: In general Number of offences (in 1,000s) has rose over the Year.
Number of offences (in 1,000s) is roughly constant from 2013/14 to 2015/16, gradually increasing from 2015/16 to 2017/18, and lastly roughly constant from 2017/18 to 2018/19.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016/17 and 2017/18.
Maximum Number of offences (in 1,000s), about 14.84 was reported at Year 2018/19
The lowest Number of offences (in 1,000s), of value 9.69 was reported at Year 2014/15
